descriptionHtml:
The old Blade of Woe was to clean for my liking. Since to have it passed down through generations of assassins you would expect it to have atlest some grime on it.
 So I changed the grip from leather to bloody cloth wraps/rags so it appears to be more worn and added some blood stain to the blade. 



------------------------Installation---------------------------------
The zip file contains a version1 (light handle wrap)
and a version 2 (dark handle wrap) pick one and drag the texture folder contained within into your Skyrim data folder.




----------------------Future Plans/updates---------------------
In the future I will be uploading more beaten and bloodied weapons and armor.
author: RatFinkk
